channel.title: v3 Whonix and Debian Packages
channel.description: Where I can find .onion mirrors v3 so I can add them to sources.list ? On wiki there is only v2

item.description:
torjunkie:

As far as I know the Debian servers don’t support v3 onions.

@Muocue My appoliges for that mistake. I’m usually more on point.

item.title: v3 Whonix and Debian Packages
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
As far as I know the Debian servers don’t support v3 onions.

Only available for Whonix and Qubes packages.

Read full topic

item.title: v3 Whonix and Debian Packages
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi Muocue

The v3 onion address was taken out because that is what the upcoming Whonix 14 defaults to. Of course that does not help if your using Whonix 13.

The v3 address is: dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion

Do not trust me though. You can/should confirm this by clicking on the .onion links on the forcing onion page that entr0py posted. This is the same address that will be in your browser address bar.

This address is alo listed elsewhere in the wiki “Security Guide”. You just have to look carefully.

Read full topic

item.title: v3 Whonix and Debian Packages
item.dc:creator: Muocue
item.description:
It’s not that I need or I can’t find there what I need.

On wiki i find only v2 http://whonix.org/wiki/Security_Guide#Whonix_and_Debian_Packages

#deb http://ftp.debian.org/debian jessie main contrib non-free
deb http://vwakviie2ienjx6t.onion/debian jessie main contrib non-free

#deb http://security.debian.org jessie/updates main contrib non-free
deb http://sgvtcaew4bxjd7ln.onion jessie/updates main contrib non-free

#Optional Backports
#deb http://ftp.debian.org/debian jessie-backports main contrib non-free
deb http://vwakviie2ienjx6t.onion/debian jessie-backports main contrib non-free

I need the same for v3

Read full topic
